alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 9:31AM CDT until May 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .The Forest River is expected to continue rising towards Moderate Flood Stage over the next few days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. During high flow, river may bypass Minto to the south and flow into Lake Ardoch. Urban flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 8.1 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
